title: REGULAR FORUM USERS - YOUR CLUB NEEDS YOU!

posts.content:
We're just preparing to move the club forum to a new home, and we could just do with some users to 'destruction test' a temporary version of the site.
Even if you're not a current user, you can register and log in to help ensure that the transition goes as smoothly as possible.
The address for the temporary forum is

http://forum.ssvc.org.uk/phpbb/index.php

Bear in mind that anything posted here will not be kept, and will be replaced with the live forum data in the near future, including new user accounts.

Thanks in advance,

Nige,

SSVC Web Co-ordinator
Has or is the club being sold or transferred to new owner or private company?

Nige

I have made a few postings on the site including pictures and they have all appeared, have sent a PM to Maddison but he's not read it yet but it appears in my Outbox ok.

Posted on active items and a post in the Devon forum if someone else wants to repost in there?

Richard
Seems ok Nige
worked fine for me too
working ok for me

Search for member...

Username begins with... still doesn't work.

But the rest seems good.

Sooty

split999 wrote:
Has or is the club being sold or transferred to new owner or private company?



You rumbled us - The club has been sold to a South East Asian investment group headed up by a poultry billionaire. Apparently they plan to re-brand the club as the "Split Screen Tigers", all members vans must be painted red for the whole of 2014, and unspecified members of the committee will be sacked or forced to resign at random intervals, to be replaced by statues of increasingly bizarre deities or Japanese school girls (which ever is most appropriate) with the ultimate aim of getting promoted to the Association or British VW Owners Club, and winning best display in the Stanford Hall Champions League.
Or something like that, I wasn't really listening.

Thanks for all the other comments, peeps - most helpful

Or something like that, I wasn't really listening.

Thanks for all the other comments, peeps - most helpful




About time too!

5 litres of Ford Cardinal Red ordered!!

Yes all good Nige

Have a Awesome Christmas

Does any of this swapping about have an impact on the SSVC membership joining page, as that keeps giving an error message, when trying to join...
500 internal server error!
Infuriating!

Sooty wrote:
Search for member...

Username begins with... still doesn't work.

But the rest seems good.

Sooty


Thanks for those Sooty. We've had the renewal notice sort of sprung on us, so we're getting it moved first, then looking at getting the niggles sorted.
We tried to update to the latest version recently, but there are some old files hanging about that mean the update always fails

hopper van wrote:
Does any of this swapping about have an impact on the SSVC membership joining page, as that keeps giving an error message, when trying to join...
500 internal server error!
Infuriating!


Sort of, but not directly. There are loads of changes, bringing everything into one place before the new year. Apologies for the frustration - it should be sorted now.

Thanks everyone for your help and input.

The transition happened on the 30/31st and so far all seems to be good.

Tanks again.
